articles.author: Jordan Valinsky
articles.title: American Airlines is boarding flights again after the FAA lifted its nationwide groundstop - CNN
articles.description: Following a brief outage that grounded all American airlines flights during one of the busiest travel periods of the year, American Airlines says it has resumed service Tuesday morning.
articles.content:
Following a brief outage that grounded all American airlines flights during one of the busiest travel periods of the year, American Airlines says it has resumed service Tuesday morning.
